test.name: Login with Unregistered Mobile Number

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Element '//android.widget.TextView[@text="LOGIN"]' did not appear in 5 seconds

Traceback (most recent call last): File "<decorator-gen-68>", line 2, in wait_until_page_contains_element File "/Users/codevelopr/Library/Python/3.8/lib/python/site-packages/AppiumLibrary/keywords/keywordgroup.py", line 21, in _run_on_failure_decorator raise err File "/Users/codevelopr/Library/Python/3.8/lib/python/site-packages/AppiumLibrary/keywords/keywordgroup.py", line 16, in _run_on_failure_decorator return method(*args, **kwargs) File "/Users/codevelopr/Library/Python/3.8/lib/python/site-packages/AppiumLibrary/keywords/_waiting.py", line 88, in wait_until_page_contains_element self._wait_until(timeout, error, self._is_element_present, locator) File "/Users/codevelopr/Library/Python/3.8/lib/python/site-packages/AppiumLibrary/keywords/_waiting.py", line 122, in _wait_until self._wait_until_no_error(timeout, wait_func) File "/Users/codevelopr/Library/Python/3.8/lib/python/site-packages/AppiumLibrary/keywords/_waiting.py", line 133, in _wait_until_no_error raise AssertionError(timeout_error)
